title: DDQ catalyzed oxidative lactonization of indole-3-butyric acids
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24207-24211
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05265J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Christos Nixarlidis, John D. Chisholm
Indole-3-butyric acids can be oxidized to lactones via 2,3-dichloro-5,6-dicyano-1,4-benzoquinone (DDQ) catalysis with MnO2 as the stoichiometric oxidant.
